src/components/DashColorscales.react.js.description:
DashColorscales is a Dash wrapper for `react-colorscales`.
It takes an array of colors, `colorscale`, and
displays a UI for modifying it or choosing a new scale.

id.description: The ID used to identify this compnent in Dash callbacks

colorscale.description: Optional: Initial colorscale to display. Default is Viridis.

nSwatches.description: Optional: Initial number of colors in scale to display.

fixSwatches.description: Optional: Set to `True` to fix the number of colors in the scale.

setProps.description:
Dash-assigned callback that should be called whenever any of the
properties change
